title: Welcome to the Help & Support board
body:
The Help & Support board is a place for players to seek technical help for any League of Legends related issues and for posting general questions to the Riot Player Support team.

Community members are encouraged to lend a hand to their fellow players if they see a problem they believe they can help fix. Rioters will also try to keep this board updated when a fix for a common or new issue is discovered, or if issues occur on the day of a new patch.

If you have a question about a technical issue this is a great place to post it, otherwise for more serious or complicated issues you can also submit a support ticket [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

---
We also have our volunteer [Wrenchmen](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/nE4lj5EB-introducing-the-wrenchmen) who will always try to jump in and help so give them a shout as well.

replies.body: To clarify, this board is primarily for players to seek help from and share solutions with others. I will drop by when I can to update known solutions and provide help where possible. If you are in need of more in depth support or are not having any luck here then we encourage you to [raise a support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new).

I'd like to see some more red activity on these boards. Gets kind of baron without them.

Why isn't there an avatar for Baron Nashor?

"The Help & Support board is a place for players to seek technical help for any League of Legends related issues and for posting general questions to the Riot Player Support team." - Riot 2014

Oooo really?

My rp wont come through... I spent $10 on it via card. it said error and i tried it again but the results were the same, I check my bank acc and it spent $20 of my money but both times it said error and i still havent even recieved my rp? wtf help me out here.

Gday to who it may concern, the loading screen froze on my last aram match and after trying to close and restart the client (it kept failing to connect to server even though my internet connection was fine), i finally get back in only to have the leave buster hassle me about going afk when i didn't. can you please fix. i refuse to acknowledge it for something from the clients end. Cheers guys :-)
